name: Cake Ho!
description:
Use the left mouse button to select and interact with the elements of the game.

Press Space to skip the intro.

 

   Game created for the Mini Jam 94: Baking

   Developper: Gaspard Thirion

   Art: Nogg / Skibidip

   GD/Sondier: Maerys

   Music:  L'Anonyme

Sound stencils: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iPToKmyZi74&ab_channel=LukasEriksen

Sound colors: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AQUsJXin4EY&ab_channel=GreenPedia

Fonts : 

  • Darkest Pearl: https://www.fontspace.com/thedarkestpearl-font-f54636
  • Black Pearl: https://www.fontspace.com/blackpearl-font-f28295
